page.title: 10Midelney Manor (1)
page.content: I was born in Berlin in 1949.I came to Britain as a child and attended Fivehead primary school and then Huish Episcopi secondary school.I married in 1972 and for the next 7 years lived in Wiltshire and Dorset.We moved to Midelney in 1979. I worked for Major and Mrs Trevilian who live in the Manor.In my job I used to clean the manor each morning from nine until twelve.If Mrs Trevilian had house guests I used to help prepare the bedrooms and help prepare the meals.One of my duties was to do the washing except for sheets which were sent to a laundry.My least favourite job was the annual task of scrubbing the huge hall floor.Donning my wellington boots and clutching a long handled scrubbing brush,I used to scour the floor,thankful when the last stone was clean.
